title: All About Eve
description: A seemingly timid but secretly manipulative ingenue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

title: Sunset Boulevard
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A struggling screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Rashomon
description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recounted from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
description: A major jewelry heist goes awry in a Midwestern city, as the criminals involved are double-crossed and turn on each other.

title: Cinderella
description: When her cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Born Yesterday
description: A corrupt tycoon hires a tutor to refine his ditzy girlfriend, but the plan backfires as she becomes educated and assertive.

title: Harvey
description: A whimsical man is committed to a sanitarium after his sister and niece grow tired of his insistence that he has an invisible six-foot-tall rabbit for a best friend.

title: In a Lonely Place
description: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her own doubts.

title: Father of the Bride
description: A father's life is turned upside down when his daughter announces she's getting married.

title: Orpheus
description: A poet becomes obsessed with a mysterious princess who is actually Death, and his journey into the underworld to find her.

title: The Gunfighter
description: An aging gunfighter tries to retire, but his past and his reputation make it impossible.

title: Winchester '73
description: A man's prized rifle is stolen, and he must track it down as it changes hands among a variety of characters in the Old West.

title: Rio Grande
description: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is confronted with his estranged wife and son, a new recruit, while dealing with an Apache uprising.

title: Treasure Island
description: The classic story of a young boy who finds a treasure map and sets off on a voyage to find the loot, but must contend with a mutinous crew of pirates.

title: The Flame and the Arrow
description: A Lombard rebel in medieval Italy leads a revolt against a Hessian tyrant.

title: The Breaking Point
description: A fishing boat captain, facing financial hardship, gets involved with smuggling illegal immigrants and finds himself in a dangerous situation.

title: Samson and Delilah
description: The biblical story of the strongman Samson and his betrayal by the beautiful Delilah.

title: Wagon Master
description: Two young horse traders are hired to guide a wagon train of Mormons to the San Juan Valley.

title: Annie Get Your Gun
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rises to fame while dealing with a tumultuous romance.

title: Night and the City
description: A small-time hustler in London has ambitions to become a big-time wrestling promoter, but his plans are complicated by his involvement with a crime boss.

title: The Men
description: A paralyzed World War II veteran struggles to adjust to his new life and the woman who loves him.

title: Panic in the Streets
description: A doctor and a police detective have 48 hours to find a killer infected with pneumonic plague in New Orleans.

title: Broken Arrow
description: An ex-soldier tries to make peace between settlers and Apaches in Arizona, and falls in love with a young Apache woman.

title: Summer Stock
description: A farmer gets roped into letting an acting troupe use her barn as a theater, and she falls for the director.

title: A Streetcar Named Desire
description: Disturbed former schoolteacher Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

title: The African Queen
description: In Africa during WWI, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

title: An American in Paris
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: An American expatriate painter finds success in Paris and falls for a beautiful French girl, who is engaged to a cabaret singer.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A psychopathic man tries to pressure a tennis star into a murder-for-murder pact.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
description: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

title: Ace in the Hole
description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into a media circus.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: The Thing from Another World
description: Scientists at an Arctic research station discover a spacecraft buried in the ice and a hostile alien creature frozen within.

title: A Place in the Sun
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A young man wins a place in high society, but his dark past threatens to destroy everything.

title: Detective Story
description: A day in the life of a New York City police detective, whose rigid moral code is tested by the criminals he encounters and a secret from his wife's past.

title: Quo Vadis
description: In ancient Rome, a Roman commander falls in love with a Christian woman and begins to question the tyrannical rule of the emperor Nero.

title: The Lavender Hill Mob
description: A meek bank clerk who has been plotting a gold bullion heist for years finds the perfect accomplices.

title: The Man in the White Suit
description: An idealistic scientist invents a fabric that never gets dirty or wears out, but the textile industry conspires to suppress his invention.

title: A Christmas Carol
description: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by three ghosts on Christmas Eve.

title: The River
description: An English family living in India on the banks of the Ganges River experiences the joys and sorrows of life and love.

title: Show Boat
description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened by his addiction.

title: The Prowler
description: A police officer becomes obsessed with a lonely housewife and conspires with her to murder her wealthy husband.

title: Royal Wedding
description: A brother-and-sister dance team find romance in London during the Royal Wedding.

title: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
description: A beautiful and enigmatic woman in a Spanish coastal village becomes involved with the captain of a mysterious yacht, who may be the legendary Flying Dutchman.

title: Decision Before Dawn
description: In the closing days of World War II, a German prisoner of war is recruited by the Americans for a dangerous espionage mission.

title: Death of a Salesman
description: An aging, traveling salesman, after a lifetime of chasing the American Dream, is brought to the brink by his professional and personal failures.

title: The Blue Veil
description: After her own child dies, a woman dedicates her life to being a nanny for other people's children.

title: The Well
description: Racial tensions in a small town flare up when a black man is accused of kidnapping a white girl, but the community must come together when the girl falls into a well.

title: The Great Caruso
description: The life of the legendary Italian opera tenor Enrico Caruso.

title: Across the Wide Missouri
description: In the 1830s, a fur trapper takes a Blackfoot chief's daughter as his wife in order to safely hunt in their territory, but his plans are complicated when he falls in love with her.

title: Othello
description: The tragic story of a Moorish general who is deceived by his trusted ensign into believing that his wife is unfaithful.

title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

title: High Noon
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A town marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader is released from prison.

title: Ikiru
description: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

title: The Quiet Man
description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

title: The Bad and the Beautiful
description: An unscrupulous movie producer manipulates the lives of a director, an actress, and a writer.

title: The Greatest Show on Earth
description: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

title: Limelight
description: A washed-up comedian saves a suicidal ballerina from a gas-filled room and helps her find success, while his own career continues to decline.

title: The Member of the Wedding
description: A lonely, tomboyish 12-year-old girl in a small Southern town develops a crush on her older brother and his fiancée, and wants to go on their honeymoon with them.

title: Viva Zapata!
description: The story of the Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata.

title: Monkey Business
description: A chemist, trying to find a youth formula, accidentally creates a potion that makes him and his wife act like teenagers.

title: Umberto D.
description: An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive in poverty-stricken, post-war Rome.

title: The Crimson Pirate
description: A pirate with a passion for acrobatics and a mischievous sense of humor gets involved in a rebellion in the Caribbean.

title: Ivanhoe
description: A knight returns from the Crusades to find England under the rule of the tyrannical Prince John and becomes a champion of the oppressed Saxons.

title: Come Back, Little Sheba
description: The troubled marriage of a middle-aged couple is further complicated when they take in a young boarder.

title: The Life of Oharu
description: The tragic story of a woman's descent from a respected courtesan to a street prostitute in 17th-century Japan.

title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
description: A writer on safari in Africa reflects on his life and loves as he lies dying from an infection.

title: My Son John
description: A devoutly Catholic couple suspects their intellectual son may be a Communist spy.

title: Sudden Fear
description: A successful playwright marries an actor she once rejected for a role, but soon comes to suspect that he is plotting to murder her.

title: Bend of the River
description: A former border raider leads a wagon train of settlers to Oregon, but faces betrayal and danger along the way.

title: The Lusty Men
description: A washed-up rodeo star takes a young ranch hand under his wing and teaches him the ropes, but their relationship is complicated by the young man's wife.

title: Moulin Rouge
description: The story of the life and career of the French artist Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec.

title: Hans Christian Andersen
description: A musical fantasy about the life of the Danish storyteller Hans Christian Andersen.

title: Don't Bother to Knock
description: A mentally disturbed babysitter's erratic behavior alarms the parents of the child in her care.

title: From Here to Eternity
description: In 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

title: Shane
description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homesteading family, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

title: Roman Holiday
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: The Wages of Fear
description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but the children have little time for them.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Two showgirls travel to Paris, but find themselves in trouble when one of them is accused of stealing a diamond tiara.

title: Peter Pan
description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

title: The Band Wagon
description: A has-been movie star attempts a comeback in a Broadway show, but his artistic differences with the director and his leading lady threaten the production.

title: Stalag 17
description: A group of American airmen in a German POW camp during World War II suspect that one of their own is a spy.

title: Ugetsu
description: Two peasants in 16th-century Japan are driven by greed and ambition, leading them to abandon their families and pursue their desires, with tragic consequences.

title: The Big Heat
description: A police detective takes on a powerful crime syndicate after his wife is killed in a car bomb meant for him.

title: Mogambo
description: On an African safari, a married woman and a showgirl compete for the affections of a big-game hunter.

title: How to Marry a Millionaire
description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find love in unexpected places.

title: The Robe
description: A Roman tribune in charge of the crucifixion of Jesus wins his robe in a dice game and is profoundly affected by it.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The story of the conspiracy against the Roman dictator Julius Caesar, his assassination and the defeat of his conspirators.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for Communist spies and becomes a target for both the spies and the U.S. government.

title: The Bigamist
description: A traveling salesman leads a double life with two wives, but his secret is threatened when he tries to adopt a child.

title: The Naked Spur
description: A bounty hunter, a prospector, and a renegade soldier team up to capture an outlaw, but their greed and mistrust threaten to tear them apart.

title: The Wild One
description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town.

title: House of Wax
description: A talented sculptor is horribly burned in a fire set by his business partner and re-emerges as the proprietor of a wax museum with a sinister secret.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: The Hitch-Hiker
description: Two friends on a fishing trip pick up a hitchhiker who turns out to be a wanted murderer.

title: The Bigamist
description: A traveling salesman leads a double life with two wives, but his secret is threatened when he tries to adopt a child.

title: On the Waterfront
description: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Rear Window
description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: Seven Samurai
description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A former tennis star plots the murder of his own wife after discovering she is having an affair, but his perfect crime goes awry.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Sabrina
description: A chauffeur's daughter returns from Paris after two years and captures the hearts of two wealthy brothers.

title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
description: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: The Caine Mutiny
description: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship and crew, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

title: La Strada
description: A carefree young woman is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

title: The Country Girl
description: A director offers a washed-up alcoholic actor a chance to make a comeback, but his self-destructive behavior and his long-suffering wife threaten the production.

title: White Christmas
description: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

title: The Glenn Miller Story
description: The story of the life and career of the famous American big-band trombonist and composer.

title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
description: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

title: Godzilla
description: American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.

title: Them!
description: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: In 1850 Oregon, a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, and his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

title: Carmen Jones
description: A soldier falls for a seductive factory worker, but their tempestuous romance leads to tragedy.

title: Three Coins in the Fountain
description: Three American women working in Rome make a pact to find husbands by throwing coins in the Trevi Fountain.

title: Magnificent Obsession
description: A reckless playboy's actions inadvertently lead to the death of a renowned surgeon and the blinding of the surgeon's wife, whom he then tries to help anonymously.

title: The High and the Mighty
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: When a commercial airliner develops engine trouble on a trans-Pacific flight, the passengers and crew must face the prospect of a crash landing.

title: Brigadoon
description: Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland discover a magical village that appears for only one day every 100 years.

title: Executive Suite
description: The president of a major corporation dies suddenly, and the board of directors must choose his successor.

title: Sansho the Bailiff
description: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is exiled, and his family is torn apart. His children grow up as slaves, but they never forget their father's teachings.

title: Johnny Guitar
description: A strong-willed saloon owner is wrongly suspected of a crime and must contend with a jealous, lynch-mob-leading rival.

title: Animal Farm
description: A group of farm animals rebel against their human farmer, hoping to create a society where the animals can be equal, free, and happy.

title: Rebel Without a Cause
description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

title: The Night of the Hunter
description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: Marty
description: A middle-aged butcher from the Bronx and a lonely school teacher meet at a dance and unexpectedly fall in love.

title: Lady and the Tramp
description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: East of Eden
description: A wayward young man struggles to earn the affection of his deeply religious father while competing against his favored brother.

title: The Seven Year Itch
description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful new neighbor.

title: Pather Panchali
description: The life of a young boy named Apu and his impoverished family in rural Bengal.

title: The Rose Tattoo
description: A Sicilian-American widow finds new love and learns the truth about her late husband.

title: To Catch a Thief
description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after he is suspected of a new series of burglaries on the French Riviera.

title: Mister Roberts
description: An idealistic young officer on a cargo ship in the Pacific during World War II clashes with his tyrannical captain.

title: Oklahoma!
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

title: Bad Day at Black Rock
description: A one-armed stranger's arrival in a remote desert town after World War II uncovers a dark secret.

title: Guys and Dolls
description: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

title: Blackboard Jungle
description: An idealistic teacher faces a classroom of rebellious, inner-city teenagers.

title: Ordet
description: The lives of a devout Danish farming family are thrown into turmoil when one of the sons goes insane, believing he is Jesus Christ.

title: Les Diaboliques
description: The wife and mistress of a cruel schoolmaster conspire to murder him, but their plan takes a supernatural turn.

title: Kiss Me Deadly
description: A brutish private eye stumbles upon a conspiracy of epic proportions while investigating a murder.

title: Richard III
description: Shakespeare's story of the evil king's bloody reign and his quest for power.

title: The Man with the Golden Arm
description: A heroin addict and professional card dealer struggles to stay clean and deal with his manipulative, wheelchair-bound wife.

title: The Desperate Hours
description: Three escaped convicts take a suburban family hostage.

title: The Court Jester
description: A carnival performer impersonates the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.

title: The Dam Busters
description: The story of the British Royal Air Force's mission to destroy three dams in Germany's Ruhr Valley during World War II.

title: I'll Cry Tomorrow
description: The story of singer Lillian Roth's battle with alcoholism.

title: Summertime
description: A lonely American spinster on vacation in Venice finds romance with a handsome Italian shopkeeper.

title: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A Eurasian doctor and an American journalist fall in love in Hong Kong during the Korean War.

title: The Ten Commandments
description: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

title: The Searchers
description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid.

title: Giant
description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

title: The King and I
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

title: Around the World in 80 Days
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

title: Forbidden Planet
description: A starship crew travels to a distant planet to investigate the fate of an earlier expedition, only to find a mysterious and powerful force at play.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: A family vacationing in Morocco accidentally stumbles upon an assassination plot and their son is kidnapped to ensure their silence.

title: Anastasia
description: A group of Russian exiles in Paris plot to collect a huge inheritance by grooming a destitute amnesiac to pose as the Grand Duchess Anastasia.

title: The Killing
description: A career criminal gathers a team to pull off a daring racetrack heist.

title: Aparajito
description: Apu and his family move to a village, but his father's health deteriorates, and Apu must start working. He excels in his studies and gets a scholarship to go to Kolkata, leaving his lonely mother behind.

title: Lust for Life
description: The story of the life of Dutch painter Vincent van Gogh.

title: High Society
description: A wealthy socialite's wedding plans are complicated by the simultaneous arrival of her ex-husband and a tabloid magazine journalist.

title: Moby Dick
description: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

title: Bus Stop
description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to force her to marry him.

title: The Wrong Man
description: A musician is wrongly accused of a series of robberies, and his wife's mental health deteriorates as he tries to prove his innocence.

title: Friendly Persuasion
description: A family of Quakers in Indiana during the Civil War must reconcile their pacifist beliefs with the reality of the conflict.

title: A Man Escaped
description: A captured French Resistance fighter plots his escape from a Nazi prison.

title: War and Peace
description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

title: Bigger Than Life
description: A schoolteacher's life is turned upside down when an experimental drug causes him to have a psychotic breakdown.

title: Written on the Wind
description: The self-destructive behavior of a Texas oil family's children threatens to tear the family apart.

title: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
description: A World War II veteran struggles to balance the demands of his suburban family life with his high-pressure job in New York City.

title: The Bad Seed
description: A mother begins to suspect that her angelic-looking daughter is a murderer.

title: Baby Doll
description: A middle-aged cotton gin owner's marriage to his child bride is threatened when a business rival arrives in their small Mississippi town.

title: Somebody Up There Likes Me
description: The story of boxer Rocky Graziano's rise from a troubled youth to the middleweight champion of the world.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are plotting a daring mission to destroy it.

title: Paths of Glory
description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
description: A veteran British barrister must defend a man in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: The Seventh Seal
description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
description: A powerful but unethical Broadway columnist uses his connections to ruin his sister's relationship with a man he deems unworthy.

title: Wild Strawberries
description: After a vivid nightmare, an elderly professor confronts his mortality and regrets as he travels to receive an honorary degree.

title: Funny Face
description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to prison. It's a battle of wills as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
description: When a man is exposed to a cloud of radioactive spray, he finds himself shrinking, facing a new world of danger and despair.

title: An Affair to Remember
description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

title: Jailhouse Rock
description: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

title: Peyton Place
description: The seemingly tranquil lives of a small New England town are turned upside down by lust, scandal, and murder.

title: Love in the Afternoon
description: A young music student's budding romance with an older, wealthy American playboy is complicated by her father, a private detective hired to entrap him with his lover's husband.

title: Old Yeller
description: A boy brings a yellow dog home, and the dog's loyalty and courage are put to the test.

title: The Three Faces of Eve
description: A doctor treats a woman with multiple personality disorder.

title: Sayonara
description: An American Air Force major in post-World War II Japan falls in love with a Japanese actress.

title: A Face in the Crowd
description: A charismatic drifter becomes a powerful media personality, but his ambition and ego lead to his downfall.

title: Throne of Blood
description: A Japanese warrior, spurred on by his ambitious wife and a prophecy from a witch, murders his lord and takes his place.

title: Vertigo
description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

title: Touch of Evil
description: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: Gigi
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A Parisian courtesan in training is pursued by a wealthy playboy.

title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
description: A Southern family celebrates the sixty-fifth birthday of their patriarch, who is unaware that he is dying of cancer.

title: The Defiant Ones
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: Two escaped convicts, one white and one black, chained together, must learn to cooperate in order to elude capture.

title: Auntie Mame
description: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Together they live through the 1920s, the Great Depression, and World War II.

title: The Big Country
description: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

title: The Long, Hot Summer
description: A drifter finds work with a wealthy, powerful family in a small Mississippi town, and his presence stirs up old resentments and new passions.

title: The Fly
description: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

title: Dracula
description: Jonathan Harker begets the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses.

title: Separate Tables
description: The lives of several guests at a seaside hotel in England are turned upside down by the arrival of a glamorous divorcée.

title: The Old Man and the Sea
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic marlin. He is forced to endure a back-breaking struggle with the powerful fish and must contend with sharks who are after his prize.

title: I Want to Live!
description: A prostitute is wrongly convicted of murder and sentenced to death. A psychologist and a reporter work to prove her innocence.

title: Ashes and Diamonds
description: On the last day of World War II, a young Polish resistance fighter is ordered to assassinate a Communist official, but he falls in love with a barmaid and questions his mission.

title: The Hidden Fortress
description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants escort a man and woman across enemy lines. However, they do not realize that their companions are actually a princess and her general.

title: Some Like It Hot
description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country by them and the police.

title: Ben-Hur
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Anatomy of a Murder
description: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity induced by the rape of his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

title: The 400 Blows
description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy curses the infant Princess Aurora, decreeing that she will die on her 16th birthday.

title: Rio Bravo
description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

title: The Diary of Anne Frank
description: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

title: Pillow Talk
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A man and a woman who share a party line cannot stand each other, but he falls for her when he meets her in person.

title: The Nun's Story
description: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, doubt, and World War II.
